item.description:
Sustainability, Nations and Globalization: Can We Have Them All?
Wednesday, October 3, 2012 - 4:00pm - 5:30pm
http://www.hsph.harvard.edu/centers-institutes/population-development/events/cur...
Contact Name: Angela Smith Waxman
asmithwa@hsph.harvard.edu
Harvard Kennedy School of Government, Bell Hall, Belfer Building Room 503, 79 John F. Kennedy Street, Cambridge
 

Mark your calendars for October 3, 2012 when the Harvard Center for Population and Development Studies and the Sustainability Science Program at the Harvard Kennedy School of Government co-host a special event with Joel E. Cohen, Abby Rockefeller Mauzé Professor, Laboratory of Populations, Rockefeller University. Dr. Cohen will present “Sustainability, Nations and Globalization: Can We Have Them All?”

The lecture is open to everyone and there is no cost to attend
item.name: Sustainability, Nations and Globalization
